title: Chihuo Yuzhou
synopsis: This is a delicious and fun animated movie starred by hundreds of Chinese and foreign food stars. On Flour Planet, a lucky dumpling with a coin in her head, but unhappy because of this "lucky", she aspires to be like everyone else, accepting the perfect transformation invitation from the All-Eater Planet, and the simple and honest man steamed bun Something seems to be a foreboding, along the way, a conspiracy is waiting for her (them)...Between life and death, for friends, what choice would Baozi make? At the time of destruction, how can dumplings turn the tide? The food-eating universe witnesses the miracle of self and friendship. In addition to dumplings and steamed buns, there are middle-aged fritters with split personality, paranoid men's flatbread rolls, unconvinced "hard" baguettes and five-ren moon cakes, instant noodles chasing dreams, and allegro sticky twists...they. What kind of comedy will be staged again? (translated from douban)
